AbeloHost is a high quality hosting provider. By hosting on our servers you will benefit from increased performance, greater security, immediate support and exclusive use of the servers system and network resources. Our pledge is to provide our customers with nothing but the best-quality and the most fully-featured services at reasonable prices.

We are now running a Free Trial service for all our European VPS servers. This is a limited-time special offer.


•••••••••• Benefits of choosing AbeloHost ••••••••••
- DDoS protection (click here for a picture of our actual DDoS filter)
- Full data integrity
- Located in a TIER III datacenter
- Assistance with VPS installation and management


•••••••••• Switch easily to AbeloHost ••••••••••
If you already have a vps elsewhere, then switch to AbeloHost and receive a better deal!
We have a hassle free migration service. We will:

• Migrate your accounts from your old host
• Migrate all MySQL db's intact
• Migrate all scripts and applications
• Migrate all subdomains, cPanel settings, FTP accounts, email accounts, autoresponders, mailing lists and more

Click here to write a ticket or Skype (ilgar.abelohostbv) us to start the migration process. 

All VPS located on own hardware in Dronten, the Netherlands.
